info.name: G&S Forum Style - Halloween/Autumn/Fall edition.
info.description: Say goodbye to the green and hello to the orange!
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1.3:Fixes for new site style bleeding through into forum.
v1.1.2:Replaced sidebar +/- image. Now has correct transparency.
v1.1.1:A fix for the fix! :/
v1.1:Fixes a few bugs caused by latest forum upgrade.
v1:First version, everything should be ok. Apologies for the messy CSS. If you use an old browser, some things might not work correctly. :)
